translated: All wishes for harmony and affection will be accomplished.

Complete eight thousand times in this way.
Use the wood of the mulberry tree as firewood to burn it.

Do not ask about the lightness or heaviness.

Recite the mantra eight thousand times.
Take persimmon wood as firewood to burn it.

Burn them mixed with ghee, honey, and curds.
Recite the mantra eight thousand times and the rain will stop immediately.
Another method is to take white rice, black sesame, curds,
ghee, and honey.
Take firewood from a charnel ground to burn it.
Recite the mantra once for each throw.
Do this eight thousand times.
It will stop bad winds, storms, cold rain, and other difficulties.

Take the firewood back and make a fire.
Recite the mantra once and throw [the firewood] once.
Do this for a full eight thousand times.

Recite the mantra once and throw [the mixture] into the fire once.
Do this for a full eight hundred times.
Then all Vināyakas
will run straight to kill and beat [the enemies].

mix them with ghee, honey, curds, and so on.

Do this for a full one hundred and eight times.

so that I may never lack.
One will then attain one's wish.
The deity will then disappear.
Whether the mantra practitioner is walking or sitting,
They will all see the hidden treasures.
What is used will be inexhaustible.

White mustard seeds,
Curds, brown sugar, ghee, and asafetida mixed together.
Use the five woods as the fire.
Recite the mantra once and throw it into the fire once.
Do this for a full eight thousand times.

White mustard seeds, and vinegar mixed together.
Use the seeds of the wood as the fire.
Recite the mantra once and throw it into the fire once.
Do this 8,000 times.
